workExperiences.title: DevOps- Full-stack developper-contract-fulltime

workExperiences.description2: For this project I was tasked to work on different areas of the app, create new forms in the front-end and their back-end counterparts, make sure our calls respected SOC2 sertification make sure the provided designs were properly coded as well

workExperiences.title: Full-stack developper-freelance
workExperiences.description: Develop an option to send emails for the customer relationship management system: Create an automated system to send communications, on demand or on a predefined schedule to the clients. Create new endpoints in the back-end to add the communications to the database. Modify the front-end interface to support the new option.

workExperiences.title: Full-stack developper-freelance
